name: moistly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is slightly wet: The biscuits should be crisp on the outside and moistly soft inside. The pavements gleamed moistly in the evening light.
More examplesFewer examplesThe meat should be moistly coated in the cooking juices when you have finished cooking.He shook my hand firmly, but rather moistly.The snow fell moistly, melting as soon as it hit the ground.Big beads of sweat glistened moistly on his forehead as he sawed the wood.
